properties.description:
Anyone is welcome to pop in anytime the church is open, the office is manned Tuesday, Thursday and Friday mornings.
We have regular activities at the following times:
Tuesdays 9:30-12 Art Group including tea/coffee
Thursdays 10-1130 Little Fishes toddler group
Sundays 12-1 tea/coffee following our morning service at 10:30 (no need to come to service)
Sundays term-time 630-8pm Pulse youth group (years 6-9), Accessible Toilet, Wifi and Hot Shower Available
